summary: TypeScript compilation error in processTranscription.ts:167 - array access could return undefined

failures.criterion: Build verification - pnpm typecheck must pass
failures.actual: Type error: Argument of type 'number | undefined' is not assignable to parameter of type 'number' at processTranscription.ts:167
failures.evidence: src/features/transcription/processTranscription.ts(167,19): error TS2345: Argument of type 'number | undefined' is not assignable to parameter of type 'number'. Type 'undefined' is not assignable to type 'number'.

recommendation: Fix type error by adding fallback or type assertion: `const delayMs = RETRY_DELAYS_MS[attempt - 1] ?? 1000;`
notes: All 5 acceptance criteria are correctly implemented in logic. This is a trivial fix - just needs proper TypeScript type handling. Implementation quality is excellent otherwise.
